Hero.description: CodeHunter Lab operates at the intersection of deep technical engineering, product strategy, and user-centric design to accelerate your digital roadmap.

Footer.brandDescription: Architecting the future of enterprise automation and AI-driven workflows.

Expertise.subtitle: Hunting the balance between clean code, UX and real impact.

frontend.title: Frontend Architecture
frontend.micro: Scalable, maintainable systems built for long-term impact.
frontend.heading: Building scalable, maintainable and high-impact web applications.

paragraphs.0: We design and lead the development of scalable, maintainable, and high-impact web applications. Our work is rooted in modern frontend architecture, with hands-on expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, focused on long-term scalability, performance, and developer experience.
paragraphs.1: This is not just about writing code, but about making architectural decisions that reduce complexity, scale teams, and support evolving product needs.

bullets.2: Code quality, testing strategies and sustainability

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce & Performance
ecommerce.micro: Revenue-critical platforms optimised for speed and conversion.
ecommerce.heading: Revenue-critical platforms optimised for speed, UX and conversion.

paragraphs.0: We specialise in revenue-critical ecommerce platforms, where performance, UX, and reliability directly impact conversion and business outcomes.
paragraphs.1: From leading complex Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) migrations to optimising existing Shopify and custom stacks, our focus is on building fast, accessible, and conversion-friendly user journeys.

bullets.0: SFCC migration leadership and frontend architecture
bullets.3: A/B testing and data-informed optimisation loops
bullets.4: Turning performance into measurable business impact

product.title: Product Strategy & AI
product.micro: Business goals translated into clear technical decisions.
product.heading: Bridging product goals with technical execution.

paragraphs.0: We bridge the gap between engineering execution and product strategy. By combining technical leadership with product thinking, we translate business goals into clear roadmaps, technical decisions, and scalable solutions.
paragraphs.1: We have led the product ownership and engineering of AI-powered applications, integrating OpenAI APIs to accelerate workflows, reduce noise, and improve decision-making across teams.

bullets.1: AI integration using OpenAI APIs and custom tooling
bullets.2: Agile / Scrum leadership and stakeholder alignment
bullets.3: Engineering decisions grounded in real constraints

automation.title: AI Automation
automation.micro: Intelligent workflows that remove friction and manual work.
automation.heading: Automating the boring, amplifying the meaningful.

paragraphs.0: We design and implement AI-powered automation workflows that reduce manual work, speed up decision-making, and improve operational efficiency across product and engineering teams.
paragraphs.1: Using tools like n8n, custom scripts and API integrations, we connect platforms, data sources and AI models to create intelligent pipelines tailored to real business needs — not over-engineered experiments.

bullets.2: Workflow orchestration across teams and tools
bullets.4: Turning raw data into actionable insights

leadership.title: Technical Leadership
leadership.micro: Clear ownership, alignment and senior decision-making.
leadership.heading: Aligning product, design and engineering around impact.

paragraphs.0: We work closely with designers, product managers, and backend teams to align technical execution with product vision. Our role often sits at the intersection of architecture, delivery, and decision-making — ensuring teams move fast without sacrificing quality.

bullets.0: Cross-functional collaboration at a senior level
bullets.1: Clear communication and ownership of decisions
bullets.2: Reducing friction between product, design and engineering

delivery.title: Delivery & Risk
delivery.micro: Predictable delivery in complex, high-impact environments.
delivery.heading: Predictable delivery in complex, high-impact environments.

paragraphs.0: We focus on predictable, high-quality delivery in complex technical environments. By applying proven engineering practices, we reduce technical risk, avoid costly rework, and ensure that products scale reliably over time.
paragraphs.1: This includes making pragmatic trade-offs, managing technical debt consciously, and building systems that are easy to evolve rather than fragile to change.

bullets.0: Clear delivery planning and scope definition
bullets.1: Quality standards, testing strategies and reviews

TheLab.title: The Lab
TheLab.subtitle: Engineered solutions and strategic project leadership that delivered measurable business impact.

0.title: Product Accelerator: AI-Powered Productivity App
0.description: Led the frontend development and Product Ownership of an AI-powered productivity web application. The challenge was to create a scalable architecture, integrating Machine Learning models and third-party APIs (OpenAI) to deliver a personalized, high-performance user experience.

results.0: Defined Frontend Architecture with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, focused on scalability and maintainability.
results.1: Integrated AI-driven features via OpenAI APIs and custom endpoints for personalized experiences.
results.2: Constant performance monitoring (Lighthouse, Core Web Vitals) and robust testing (Jest) to ensure optimized UX.
results.3: Defined vision, roadmap, and acceptance criteria, aligning technical execution with business objectives.

1.title: Basic-Fit: High-Traffic E-commerce Migration (SFCC)
1.description: Led the migration process of the Basic-Fit website to the Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) platform, a critical migration affecting consumer-facing solutions across multiple platforms. The goal was to ensure a smooth transition and improve the end-user experience, performance, and SEO.

results.0: Lead the migration to Salesforce Commerce Cloud, maintaining high user experience quality.
results.1: Implemented A/B testing for key components, achieving better conversion results.
results.2: Developed custom templates within SFCC and converted design concepts into functional, responsive websites.
results.3: Applied industry best practices for secure, scalable code with integrated analytics tools.

2.title: Empowering Digital Growth: 15+ Success Stories
2.description: Over our years of experience, we have empowered more than 15 companies to elevate their web presence, applications, and e-commerce platforms. We don't just build; we optimize for growth and scalability.

results.0: Partnered with diverse clients from startups to enterprises.
results.1: Successfully delivered scalable solutions in E-commerce, SaaS, and AI.
results.2: Improved performance, SEO, and conversion rates across all partner portfolios.

0.title: Discovery & Listening

2.title: Agile Implementation
